text: Don Gillis (1922-2008) was a sportscaster. He was sports director/sports anchor at WHDH-TV and WCVB-TV. He has called games for the Boston Red Sox in 1957 when Curt Gowdy was out because of back problems, Boston Bruins, Boston Celtics, Harvard Crimson football, and New England Patriots preseason. He also hosted a candlepin bowling program.
